CustomField.description: Required for Recruiting and Hiring Demo Scenarios. Links the Recruit (Lead) and Applicant (Opportunity) to a Campaign to track how we interacted with the recruit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required for Recruiting and Hiring Demo Scenarios. Links the Recruit (Lead) and Applicant (Opportunity) to a Campaign to track how we interacted with the recruit.
CustomField.label: Campaign
